articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishment
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishment 
Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Songun Foundry of the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the construction site of the gasification project at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Songun Foundry of the Ryongsong Machine Complex ready for going operational. 
					
					 After being briefed on the foundry before its process design, he went round the interior of the foundry for hours to acquaint himself in detail with its technical equipment and production there. 
					
					 Watching the streamlined production processes equipped with cutting-edge technology and varieties of quality castings being churned out from work sites kept neat and tidy, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that production is going at a high rate at the modern foundry. 
					
					 He gave high appreciation and thanks to the builders for their feats, noting it is a great success that the workers of the complex have brought about a new turn in the casting revolution by building the foundry required by the IT age by their own efforts and with their own technology. 
					
					 The newly built foundry is another great structure in the era of Songun of which the nation can be proud in terms of its capacity and technical equipment. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks to be fulfilled by the foundry for its management and operation.
					
					 Such basic processes as steel casting, molding and forging are important for updating the foundry and increasing the manufacture of machines, he noted, underscoring the need to steadily enhance the role of the foundry fitted with up-to-date equipment.
					
					 He learned about the production at the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					
					 He was greatly pleased to hear the report made by officials of the complex full of conviction that the complex is capable of carrying out its plan for this year ahead of schedule, ie before the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. He appreciated the exceptionally high zeal of the workers there.
					
					 The Korean people could successfully realize the socialist industrialization in such brief span of time and rapidly augment the nation's economic potential as it was strongly backed by many giant machine plants such as the complex, he noted, adding that this clearly testifies to the validity and tremendous vitality of the WPK's unique line of economic construction on giving priority to the development of heavy industry with machine-building industry as its core while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the construction site of the gasification process at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 After being briefed on the gasification process before its huge design, he went round the construction site to acquaint himself with the progress made in the project.
					
					 He repeatedly spoke highly of the shining feats performed by the workers of the complex and the builders and their helpers, noting that they not only brought about an eye-opening change in Hungnam but became able to greet the moment soon when they will shout hurrah of victory by waging a tenacious offensive true to the slogan of the Party that the DPRK can do anything when it is determined. 
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to complete the project earlier than scheduled, saying that the completion of the gasification process at the complex would make it possible not only to establish more solid Juche-oriented system of fertilizer production relying on locally available raw materials but to bring about a signal turn in settling food shortage.
					
					 He called for channeling all efforts into winding up the most profitable Juche-based fertilizer production system to complete the project as early as possible and make it possible to mass-produce fertilizers in a short span of time. 
					
					 He said that it is necessary to finish the gasification project in a brief span of time and, at the same time, speed up the construction of the process for the production of methanol, one of the essential raw materials for chemical industry, in order to bring about a radical change and leaping progress in the development of the nation's chemical industry as required by the new century. And he specified the orientation and ways to do so. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the workers of the complex would bring about a fresh turn in the construction of the gasification process by displaying matchless devotion and popular heroism in socialist construction.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Consumer Goods Exhibition
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Consumer Goods Exhibition
Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the South Hamgyong Provincial Consumer Goods Exhibition.
					Displayed in the exhibition held to mark the 26th anniversary of the policy of "August 3 consumer goods" set forth by the WPK were at least 40,000 consumer goods of 493 varieties produced by centrally- controlled industrial factories, local industrial factories and housewives' work-teams active at neighborhood units in residential quarters in the province.
					
					 He looked round varieties of consumer goods on display in the exhibition including garments, shoes, foodstuff, household goods, kitchen utensils, school things, goods for cultural use and sundry goods for daily use to learn in detail about the production of "August 3 consumer goods."
					
					 Useful goods produced by factories and enterprises and housewives' work-teams in the province by use of by-products and leftovers are popular among customers and are of big help to the people's living, he said, adding that the experience gained by them in the past eloquently proves that it is possible to mass-produce light industrial goods required by people without making large investment when the officials work hard and thus make a positive contribution to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Noting that the number of daily necessities shops and work-teams, housewives' work-teams, sideline work-teams, housewives for  communal amenities and varieties of consumer goods are on the steady increase in provinces, cities and counties and at factories and enterprises to make a great contribution to people's living, he stressed that this reality clearly testifies to the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy on energetically producing "August 3 consumer goods" as a movement involving all masses.
					
					 After going round the exhibition, he set forth on the spot important tasks which would serve as guidelines for waging a dynamic drive for producing the above-said goods.
					
					 He underscored the need for Pyongyang, provinces, cities and counties to strenuously push forward the production of those goods without interruption, deeply aware of the significance and importance of the movement for the production of "August 3 consumer goods."
					
					 The more bountiful the people's life becomes and the higher their cultural level rises, the more quality goods they require, he noted, underlining the need to operate the light industrial factories in Pyongyang and local areas at full capacity and pay primary attention to decisively improving the quality of the "August 3 consumer goods" by giving full play to the responsibility and creative ingenuity of producers at all units.
					
					 Pointing out that it is the firm determination and will of the WPK to bring about a radical turn in the people's living this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea, he earnestly called for making a big leap forward at all units producing consumers goods to proudly participate in the great October festival with labor gifts representing their loyalty.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: KPA Command Vows to Counter S. Korean Drill by Physical Retaliation
articles.content:
KPA Command Vows to Counter S. Korean Drill by Physical Retaliation
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Warmongers of the south Korean puppet military are going to kick off direct military provocations against the DPRK in the waters around five islets in the West Sea of Korea after escalating the madcap naval exercises targeted against it in the East and West seas of Korea in the wake of their fabrication of the "Cheonan" case. 
					 The Command of Forces of the Korean People's Army in the western sector of the front issued on Tuesday the following notice in this connection:
					
					 The naval firing maneuvers to be staged by the above-said warmongers in the waters near Paekryong, Taechong and Yonphyong islets in August with all ground, naval and submarine attack means involved are not simple drills but undisguised military intrusion into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK and reckless politically motivated provocation to preserve the illegal "northern limit line" to the last. 
					
					  The anti-DPRK smear campaign started by the puppet group with the "Cheonan" case as a momentum is the unpardonable gravest provocation perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in recent years but the above-said naval firing maneuvers are a direct military invasion aimed at infringing upon the DPRK's right to self-defence.
					
					 In view of the prevailing situation, the Command of Forces of the Korean People's Army in the western sector of the front made a decisive resolution to counter the reckless naval firing projected by the group of traitors with strong physical retaliation. 
					
					 As the DPRK had already declared solemnly internally and externally, there is only the extension of the demarcation line in the West Sea of Korea fixed by the DPRK.
					
					 As regards the expected DPRK's counteraction for self-defence, the command warns in advance all the civilian ships including fishing boats not to enter the theatre of naval firing fixed by the group of traitors in the waters close to the five islets in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 It is the unshakable will and steadfast resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to return fire for fire.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Indonesian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Indonesian FM
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Talks between Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, and Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa, Indonesian foreign minister, took place in Indonesia on Monday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were the party of Pak and the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and from the Indonesian side the director general for Asia Pacific and Africa of the Foreign Ministry and others concerned. 
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their countries' situations and exchanged views on the issue of boosting bilateral friendly relations and other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Opens
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of August 3 consumer goods opened at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition Tuesday.
					 Presented there are daily necessities, grass crafts, sundry goods and other consumer goods made by factories, enterprises and housewives' production work-teams in ris, towns and districts (dongs) and reutilization production work-teams belonging to direct sales shops of cities and counties across the country. 
					
					 The displayed goods draw attention of the people for their diversity and essential utility for living.

articles.title: Pyongyang Consumer Goods Exhibition Ends
articles.content:
Pyongyang Consumer Goods Exhibition Ends
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A consumer goods show took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition in Pyongyang between July 22 and 29.
					Presented to the show, namely the Pyongyang City Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods, were more than 58,300 goods of 1,400 kinds produced by factories, enterprises and other production units in the city.
					
					 Ko In Sil, a department director of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, told KCNA that this year the variety of consumer goods had increased 1.4 times that of last year and that a large number of quality goods had been displayed at the show.
					
					 Songyo, Phyongchon, Taedonggang and Rangnang districts were highly appreciated at the show for their various and fine exhibits.
					
					 Textile goods, including children's dresses and housedresses of various models and colors, manufactured by the Songyo Knitted Goods Factory enjoyed popularity among visitors.
					
					 Various kinds of handcarts made by the Phyongchon Daily Necessities Factory and a portable gas cooker made by the Moranbong Automation Instrument Factory also attracted attention of visitors.
					
					 Also conspicuous at the show were knitted clothes and blinds from the reutilization production work-team of the Taedonggang District Direct Sales Shop, foodstuffs including maize bread with natural nutriments from the Munsu Foodstuff Factory, hand mirrors and handbags from the Housewives' Work-team Management Office of Central District and
					
					stone-processed goods from Kangdong County. 
					
					 The exhibition showed the August 3 consumer goods production movement had been further developed in the country to meet increasing public demand for consumer goods.

articles.title: Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
Postage Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- New souvenir sheets introducing songs "Patriotic Song" and "Azaleas" have been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The first song was created on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung and under his guidance, while the latter was created by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.   
					
					 The souvenir sheet introducing "Patriotic Song", national anthem, contains the words and melody of the song against the background of Mt. Paektu that is the sacred mountain of revolution, and the flag and emblem of the DPRK.
					
					 Seen in the other are the words of the song with azaleas in full bloom for a background.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Crushing Defeat of DPJ in Election
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Crushing Defeat of DPJ in Election 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- "The voice of the people is the voice of God" and the fate of the regime forsaken by the people is set to end shortly, Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a signed commentary. 
					 Recalling that the ruling Democratic Party of Japan suffered a bitter defeat in the election to the House of Councilors on July 11, the commentary observes that this is a due judgment meted out to the Japanese politicians staying in power by dint of sycophancy quite contrary to the people's mind-set, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The successive LDP regimes complied with the demands of the U.S. over the issue of the U.S. forces base in Futenma, pursuing a one-sided pro-U.S. policy against the will of the people. For this the LDP regime faced a stern judgment of history and was ousted from power.
					
					 The Hatoyama regime was upbeat, taking "a hard-line approach towards the U.S." at its beginning. But when the U.S. pressurized Japan, feeling uncomfortable with the regime, it felt frightened and reneged on its promise made with the inhabitants of Okinawa Prefecture.
					
					 All the Japanese turned their back on the regime which yielded to the U.S. after behaving against the mindset of the people without hesitation for gratifying its own political ambition, utterly indifferent to their destiny. 
					
					 At last, Hatoyama was forced to resign in less than one year since he came to power. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, Naoto Kan, successor to Hatoyama, behaved so ridiculously as kowtowing to the U.S., far from drawing a due lesson from his predecessor's fate. Naoto Kan jabbered that Japan would observe the agreement reached by the preceding regime with the U.S. although the inhabitants of Okinawa demand the dismantling of the U.S. forces base and that the Japan-U.S. alliance would be respected.
					
					 The Naoto Kan regime's unchanged submission to the U.S. was the main reason why the DPJ suffered such heavy defeat in the above-said election.
					
					 Those keen on sycophancy, forsaken by the people, are fated to face judgment of the times and destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Disgusting Sophism Snubbed
articles.content:
S. Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Disgusting Sophism Snubbed
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A call for working out an "exit strategy" to get rid of the daily escalating north-south confrontation has been heard from the south Korean ruling quarters ever since the outbreak of the warship case. 
					 Leading papers Tuesday observe in signed commentaries in this regard:
					
					 This reflects the stark reality: the international community and people are strongly critical of their moves for confrontation with compatriots and war, while urging the solution to the problem through dialogue and negotiations and their "hard-line policy toward the north" proves counter-productive. 
					
					 Papers lash out at puppet Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of south Korea Ryu Myung Hwan and minions of the "Ministry of Unification" for crying out for "a change in the north's attitude" and letting loose rubbish that "it would be impossible to discuss the exit strategy" without it.
					
					  Rodong Sinmun says: Traitor Ryu's outbursts calling for "a change in the attitude of the north" and linking it with the "exit strategy" remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 This only betrays the sinister intention of the puppet group to pass the buck for the case of warship sinking on the DPRK in a bid to justify and prolong the racket for escalating the confrontation with it and igniting a war against it. 
					
					 Now that their anti-DPRK smear campaign proved to be a total fiasco, there is no other way for the puppet forces but to admit and apologize for their crimes. 
					
					 What matters is that the conservative group remains unchanged in its confrontational stand, persistently defying reality and still waiting for a chance of its success. 
					
					 The "change in attitude" and the like much touted by Ryu are no more than a far-fetched insistence of the confrontation maniac driven to a predicament by the totally bankrupt anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 Minju Joson observes: The inter-Korean relations can never improve nor can the south Korean authorities weather their ruling crisis as long as the confrontation maniacs are allowed to stay in power as they are working hard to prolong their remaining days, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Politics
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Politics
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics serves as a great banner of independence and dignity, a powerful treasured sword for winning victory in the revolution and a symbol of peace.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The banner of Songun represents the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea to creditably defend the country and the nation from the aggression and challenges of foreign forces by realizing the age-old desire of the Korean nation for strong national power and the unshakable resolution of the Party to realize the desire of the fellow countrymen for peace and reliably defend the security of the nation.
					
					 The Songun politics of the WPK put, by dint of matchless military power, an end to the history in which the Korean nation was subject to sufferings for being weak. It also helped make a new history of independence and dignity, putting the Korean nation in the centre of the world.
					
					 There has come the greatest heyday of prosperity in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years and the dignity and pride of the nation are being fully demonstrated before the world.
					
					 It is thanks to the Songun politics that no one dares do harm to the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Songun politics serves as a shield of patriotism as it helps frustrate the persistent moves of the U.S. and its lackeys to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK and defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and creditably protect the security of the nation. 
					
					 The DPRK is resolutely frustrating the vicious military provocative moves of the aggressors at home and abroad and creditably defending the supreme interests of the country, peace on the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Thanks to the might of Songun, peace on the peninsula has been preserved and the security of all Koreans protected and they are dynamically marching along the road of national independence and reunification indicated by Songun.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about "Cheonan" Case Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The "Joint Action for Probe into the Truth about Warship 'Cheonan' Case and Peace on the Korean Peninsula" of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 29 demanding probe into the truth about the case of the warship sinking.
					 The organization at the press conference referred to the fact that an investigation group of Russia clarified some days ago that the warship was sunk not due to a "torpedo attack by the north" but by the explosion of a mine. 
					
					 This clearly testified to the fact that the "decisive evidence" produced by the authorities was irrelevant to the case and rendered the "story about a torpedo attack by the north" hypocritical, it asserted.
					
					 In this regard the "Ministry of Defense" unilaterally refuted the above-said assertion without any scientific and objective reason but such attitude only increases the suspicion about the above-said results, it added.
					
					 The organization recalled that voices skeptical about the "results of investigation" announced by the "joint investigation team" are also heard from among officials of the "government".
					
					 It urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the ruling party to respond to the call of various circles for the "inspection of state administration" and opt for joint investigation with the north.

articles.title: Every Effort for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Every Effort for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Society of April Revolution of south Korea held a gathering in Seoul on July 29 at which it called upon the people from all walks of life to struggle for peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					 Speakers there bitterly denounced the United States and the south Korean authorities for having staged joint naval exercises targeted at the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case. 
					
					 Referring to the touch and go situation prevailing on the peninsula, they charged that the moves of the U.S. and its tool the Lee Myung Bak regime to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and their tightening of "alliance" for aggression are seriously threatening peace. 
					
					 Now is the time for the people from all walks of life including progressive civic and public organizations and political parties to go united in the actions against the U.S. and the Lee regime's rackets for war and confrontation, they held, calling upon all the people to turn out as one in the actions for averting a war and ensuring peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Discriminatory Policy toward Korean Schools under Fire
articles.content:
Discriminatory Policy toward Korean Schools under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The "2nd emergency meeting of people in Hyogo Prefecture not allowing the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools" was held in Japan on July 26.
					 Present there were Korean residents and students in Japan and Japanese citizens.
					
					 It was addressed by students of Korean high school in Kobe, parents of students and personages concerned of Japanese civic organizations.
					
					 The speakers declared they could not forgive the Japanese authorities for pursuing a discriminatory policy toward the Korean schools by using education as a lever of political power.
					
					 The discriminatory measure toward the Korean schools also runs counter to the principle of "the fundamental law of education" of Japan which advocates "equal opportunity of learning," they held, demanding that the national education of Koreans in Japan be ensured from an international point of view.
					
					 An appeal calling for settling the issue of tuition-free program for the Korean schools was adopted there.
					
					 Students and teachers of Higashi Osaka Korean middle school also conducted a signature campaign in front of railway stations including Tsuruhashi and Momotani of Osaka Prefecture on July 23.

articles.title: US-S. Korea War Exercises Protested
articles.content:
US-S. Korea War Exercises Protested
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations released a statement and an appeal on July 26 condemning the joint naval exercises by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK charged in its statement that the enemies of the DPRK turned down all dialogues including the DPRK-U.S. talks and the six-party talks. They have turned to intensifying pressure through launch of war exercises and sanctions, ignoring the international community, it added.
					
					 The peaceful public circles of Russia and friends of the DPRK demand that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop their adventurous moves against the DPRK at once and come out to the dialogue for peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia, the statement said.
					
					 The Karelia Branch of the association, too, held in its appeal that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities should come out to the negotiations, rather than posing military threat to the DPRK, to probe the truth about the "Cheonan" warship case and seek a negotiated solution to the issue of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Stand of DPRK Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Stand of DPRK Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Nine Mexican political parties and organizations including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association released a joint statement on July 25 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission "DPRK will foil the reckless military provocations of the aggressors through its own style powerful deterrent actions."
					 The statement vehemently condemned the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities' escalating reckless military provocations as a blatant challenge to the international community denying the "story about the north's involvement" in the warship "Cheonan" case and hoping for defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula in a peaceful manner and as actions running counter to the  intention of the U.N.
					
					 It is quite natural for the army and people of the DPRK to start a retaliatory sacred war based on powerful nuclear deterrent for self-defence any time deemed necessary in order to deter the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces from deliberately pushing the situation to the brink of war, it stressed.
					
					 The statement supported the just stand of the army and people of the DPRK which declared that they would take all steps to the last to thoroughly probe the truth about the fabrication and charade cooked up by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces and strongly demanded the chief architects of the case respond without delay to the proposal of the DPRK NDC for sending its inspection group for field investigation in south Korea.
					
					 It called on the political parties, governments and organizations of the world to create international atmosphere of chiding the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for faking up the "Cheonan" case, a sheer fabrication and charade orchestrated by them, and extend positive support to the army and people of the DPRK in their struggle to defend the security of the country and the dignity and honor of the nation.

articles.title: War in Victory Day Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
War in Victory Day Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Peru and Britain, round-table talk in Democratic Congo, lecture in Kyrgyzstan and film shows in Russia, Myanmar, Malaysia, Indonesia and India between July 23 and 26 to celebrate the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films showing the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the invincible might of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, and other speakers said that it was thanks to the original strategy and wise leadership of Kim Il Sung that the Korean people could achieve a historic victory in the life-and-death fight against the U.S. imperialists. And they stressed that the existence of the DPRK gives a firm guarantee for the victory in the revolution to the world progressives.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the secretary general of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the organizational secretary of the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association praised the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and underlined the need to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, disclose the sycophantic and treacherous nature of the south Korean puppet clique and the brutality of the U.S. imperialists and fully support the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo praised Kim Il Sung as an invincible and iron-willed commander who reliably defended the sovereignty of the country and shattered to smithereens the myth of the U.S. imperialist's "mightiness" by leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan said that Kim Il Sung put forward the line of simultaneously developing the economic construction and the defence upbuilding and the line of turning the entire army into an army of cadres, modernizing the entire army, placing all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress to bolster up the national defence capability and fortify the whole country as an impregnable fortress.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- One day in August Juche 39 (1950), the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea had a conference.
					 Put on the agenda of the conference was an issue of sending firewood to Seoul citizens for winter on the motion of President Kim Il Sung. When the agenda was introduced, the participants in the conference were surprised by the unexpected agenda as the country was in the thick of the war and August was one of the hottest months in Korea.
					
					 Until then, Seoul citizens had lacked firewood in winter, so anything available for cooking and heating had been burnt, including wardrobe, laundry paddle and even dinner table. Nevertheless, some of them died with cold.
					
					 The President told the conference that as Seoul had come under the control of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, its citizens should not be left to continue suffering from the lack of firewood and that the issue of firewood should be solved for them in a foresighted way.
					
					 He said Mt. Thaebaek was suitable for firewood gathering because the wooded mountain was not far from Seoul, but, in that case, the toilsome work should be done by Seoul people themselves. He then chose Mt. Solak connected with the upper stream of the Han River, saying people in the northern half of the country should undertake the work for their compatriots in Seoul.
					
					 He also indicated ways of sending firewood through the river to suit the wartime conditions. 
					
					 After the conference, logs as much as hundreds of thousands of cubic meters were cut and sent to Seoul through the Han River by a unit of the Korean People's Army so that Seoul citizens could spend that winter in their warm houses.   
					
					 The story of Mt. Solak is still told in south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige dos fabricas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige dos fabricas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la fabrica de fundicion Songun del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong y el lugar de construccion de las instalaciones de gasificacion en el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam.
					   Primeramente, el Dirigente estuvo en la fabrica de fundicion Songun a punto de inaugurarse.
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de procesos, recorrio por varias horas el interior de la fabrica enterandose detalladamente del estado de equipos tecnicos y de produccion.
					
					  Al presenciar los procesos productivos en cadena equipados con las tecnicas de punta y la produccion cuantiosa de diversas piezas fundidas de buena calidad en los talleres acondicionados limpiamente, se puso muy complacido de la normalizacion de produccion en esa moderna planta construida magnificamente. 
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores y les dio agradecimiento calificando de gran exito el hecho de que los obreros de Ryongsong trajeron un nuevo viraje en las labores para levantar la innovacion en la colada construyendo con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias esa fabrica de fundicion conforme a la epoca de IT.
					
					  Esta nueva fabrica del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong resulta otra grandiosa creacion de la epoca del Songun, de que se puede enorgullecer tanto por su capacidad como por sus equipos tecnicos.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					  Para modernizar la fabrica e incrementar la produccion de maquinas, son importantes los procesos basicos como la fundicion de acero, la colada y la forja, dijo y destaco que hay que elevar incesantemente el papel de esta fabrica dotada de equipos ultramodernos.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Dirigente se entero del estado productivo del complejo.
					
					  Al escuchar el parte de los funcionarios del complejo que aseguraron cumplir el plan de produccion de este ano antes del 65o aniversario (10 de octubre) de la fundacion del partido, se mostro muy satisfecho y elogio el extraordinario entusiasmo de lucha de los obreros. 
					
					  Gracias al respaldo dinamico de numerosas fabricas mecanicas potentes como este complejo, pudimos realizar con exito en un tiempo tan corto la industrializacion socialista y fortalecer rapidamente el poderio economico del pais, senalo.
					
					Asevero que esto deviene la manifestacion clara de la justeza y gran vitalidad de la original linea economica del PTC de desarrollar simultaneamente la industria ligera y la agricultura dando prioridad al desarrollo de la industria pesada cuyo nucleo es la industria de maquinaria.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio el lugar de construccion de las instalaciones de gasificacion del Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam. 
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano del proceso de gasificacion, averiguo en detalles como marcha la obra recorriendo el lugar de construccion.
					
					Evaluo alta y repetidamente las orgullosas proezas de los obreros, los constructores y los participantes voluntarios en la obra de Hungnam senalando que ellos trajeron un tremendo cambio en esa localidad librando la ofensiva tenaz en pleno acato a la consigna del partido de que Corea cumple todo lo que decide y ya estan a punto de declarar la victoria.
					
					Con el termino del proceso de gasificacion del complejo, se puede establecer con mas firmeza el autoctono sistema de produccion de abonos basado en las materias primas criollas y traer el cambio decisivo en la solucion del problema de alimentos, senalo y presento las tareas para cumplir esa obra con adelanto.
					
					Subrayo que se debe terminar cuanto antes la obra concentrando todas las fuerzas para completar el mas rentable sistema autoctono de produccion de abonos y producir el abono en grandes cantidades en un corto plazo.
					
					Diciendo que para modernizar radicalmente y desarrollar vertiginosamente la industria quimica del pais conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo, hay que acabar en un corto tiempo la obra de gasificacion y al mismo tiempo, acelerar tambien la construccion del proceso de produccion de metanol, una de las  materias primas basicas de la industria quimica, instruyo uno por uno el rumbo y los remedios para el particular.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que la clase obrera de Hungnam registrara el nuevo viraje en la construccion del proceso de gasificacion poniendo de manifiesto su abnegacion sin igual y heroismo masivo en la construccion socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrer
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero en constante auge productivo.
					Los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores del complejo terminaron en un corto tiempo la construccion de objetos importantes, incluyendo la caldera de fluidez circulatoria de 75 toneladas, y mejoraron la calidad del algodon de vinalon intensificando el movimiento masivo por la innovacion tecnica.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de perspectiva de la fabrica, se entero detalladamente del estado de produccion recorriendo el taller de hilado vertical, el de estiramiento y cortadura de la fibra y otros lugares.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la clase obrera de la fabrica haya terminado magnificamente en apenas unos meses la obra de ampliacion de la capacidad que demoraria varios anos segun la norma anterior.
					
					Encomio a los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos del complejo que al cabo de una apretada e intensa campana, aumentaron vertiginosamente la produccion de vinalon y elevaron rapidamente la calidad del algodon de esta fibra y evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos quienes trabajaron dedicando todo lo suyo por la prosperidad y el desarrollo de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Son muy importantes el deber y el papel de esta fabrica porque esta relacionada directamente con la vida del pueblo, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que incumben a ella.
					
					Destaco que la tarea mas importante de la fabrica es normalizar en el alto nivel la produccion e impulsar de continuo la construccion de los importantes objetos y la reconstruccion cientifico-tecnica para elevar constantemente la calidad de los productos.
					
					Para cumplirla, hay que suministrar a tiempo y en lo suficiente las materias primas y los materiales inclusive la electricidad y la antracita y garantizar el pleno funcionamiento de los equipos al cuidarlos bien en sentido tecnologico, subrayo.
					
					Enseno que el complejo debe seguir luchando dinamicamente para diversificar los productos quimicos necesarios al desarrollo economico del pais y a la vida del pueblo apoyandose en su solida base material y tecnica.
					
					El complejo debe profundizar la investigacion cientifica encaminada a obtener varios productos quimicos con productos intermedios de vinalon y al mismo tiempo, fortalecer mas el caracter autoctono de la industria quimica construyendo nuevamente los modernos hornos electricos del carburo de calcio del tipo hermetico, las torres de sintesis y los procesos de produccion de compuestos aromaticos y combustible sintetico, senalo y resolvio los problemas que se presentaban para modernizar el complejo con vistas al futuro.
					
					Indico que esta fabrica es la historica donde estan registrados los ingentes esfuerzos del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien se preocupaba tanto por mejorar las condiciones de la vida del pueblo coreano.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que la clase obrera del complejo mostrara el poderio de su fabrica ejemplar de la industria del Juche trabajando con toda su inteligencia y pasion para aumentar la produccion.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Comandancia del frente occidental del EPC advierte a belicistas del Sur
articles.content:
Comandancia del frente occidental del EPC advierte a belicistas del Sur
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los belicistas militares titeres surcoreanos, que intensifican los freneticos ejercicios maritimos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Este y el Oeste de Corea tras inventar el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", entraron por fin en el camino de cometer la provocacion militar directa contra la RPDC en las aguas cercanas a las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					Al respecto, la Comandancia del Frente Occidental del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 3 la siguiente notificacion:
					
					  Los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano planean realizar a principios de agosto el tiro en el mar movilizando los medios de golpe terrestres, maritimos y submarinos en las aguas cercanas a las islas Paekryong, Taechong y Yonphyong.
					
					  Esto no es un simple ejercicio sino el abierto acto de invasion armada contra las sagradas aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC y la imprudente provocacion politica para mantener hasta el final la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte".
					
					  La campana intrigante anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos, desatada con motivo del incidente del "Cheonan", ha sido la mas grave e imperdonable provocacion de los ultimos anos. Y el inminente ejercicio de artilleria significa la directa invasion armada contra el derecho a la autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					  Frente a la situacion creada, la Comandancia del Frente Occidental del EPC tomo la resuelta decision de aplastar ese aventurero entrenamiento de la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos con el duro golpe fisico de respuesta.
					
					  Como ya fue declarada solemnemente al interior y al exterior del pais, en el Mar Oeste de Corea existe solo la linea de demarcacion maritima establecida por la RPDC.
					
					  Puesto que se preve el golpe de represalia de la RPDC para la autodefensa, se les avisa de antemano a todos los barcos civiles, incluyendo los pesqueros, que no entren en el area fijada por los traidores surcoreanos para el tiro maritimo cuando naveguen en las aguas cercanas a las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Tratar con el fuego al fuego es la voluntad invariable y la firme decision del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea e Indonesia
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea e Indonesia 
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 2 en Indonesia las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, y su homologo de la Republica de Indonesia, Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa.
					Estuvieron presentes alli por la parte coreana la comitiva del canciller y el embajador coreano acreditado en ese pais, y por la otra el director general para Asia-Pacifico y Africa del MINREX y otros funcionarios.
					
					Ambas partes informaron sobre la situacion de sus respectivos paises e intercambiaron el problema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Iniciada la funcion de nueva version de "Arirang"
articles.content:
Iniciada la funcion de nueva version de "Arirang"
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 2 en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo el estreno de la nueva version de la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", obra laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					Su version original fue creada en 2002 con motivo del 90o aniversario (15 de abril de 2002) del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del 70o aniversario (25 de abril del mismo ano) de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					El colectivo de creadores renovo esta vez el contenido de la obra creando nuevamente el quinto acto "Arirang de amistad".
					
					Presenciaron la funcion inaugural el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Kang Nung Su, los funcionario directivos de las entidades de masas y ministerios, los militares del EPC, trabajadores capitalinos, compatriotas en ultramar y huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Los ejecutantes mostraron las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria al cabo de la larga y ensangrentada guerra antijaponesa y edifico en el territorio patrio una potencia socialista muy digna por la independencia, la autarquia y la autodefensa.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, escenificaron de modo epico la lucha heroica de todos los militares y civiles coreanos, que bajo la guia del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, producen grandes innovaciones y saltos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera conquistando tecnologias supersofisticadas.
					
					La funcion ha sido una maravilla artistica en que se combinan perfectamente los dinamicos movimientos de gimnasia, las musicas y danzas elegantes, la misteriosa pizarra humana, las resplandecientes luces electricas, etc.
